original: Cervin, Andreas, rådman, GöteboTg, f. 31/10/88 i Oikome, Hall. I, av prosten Reinh. C. o. Maria CulW berg. G. 1. 19 m. Andrea Jerlov, d. 43; 2. 46 m. Karin Heinrici. Barn: Knut f. 20, Ingrid 21, Clas 23, Ulf 26, Karin 35. — Stud:ex. v. Gbgs h. latin 08, jur. kand. i Lund 14. E. o. not. i Göta hovr. 14, tingstjg. i Sunnervikens o. Meil. Hall. domsaga 16-17, e. o. not. i rådhusr. i Gbg 18, polisnot. 26, as-sess. 27, rådman i Gbg fr. 36, ordf. å femte avd. 44, å andra avd. sed. 47. V. ordf. i Gbgs juristkil. 41-42, ordf. där 43-44.
translated: Cervin, Andreas, councilman, Gothenburg, born October 31, 1888 in Oikome, Hall. I, to the pastor Reinh. C. and Maria CulW berg. Married 1) in 1919 to Andrea Jerlov, who passed away in 1943; 2) in 1946 to Karin Heinrici. Children: Knut born in 1920, Ingrid in 1921, Clas in 1923, Ulf in 1926, and Karin in 1935. Andreas completed his studies with a high school Latin degree from Gothenburg in 1908 and a law degree from Lund University in 1914. He was an acting notary in Göta Court of Appeal in 1914, serving in Sunnervikens and Meil Hall District Courts from 1916-1917, acting notary in the Gothenburg City Hall in 1918, police notary in 1926, and assessor in 1927. He became a councilman in Gothenburg in 1936 and was chairman of the Fifth Department from 1944 and later the second department from 1947. He was also vice chairman of the Gothenburg Law Society from 1941-1942 and chairman from 1943-1944.

jobTitleHistory.name: Sunnervikens and Meil Hall District Courts
